name: Lone Shark (arlagames)
description:
Fun and challenging endless runner written using Corona SDK.

  • Eat the cute-looking fish or starfish to restore energy
  • Avoid eating the angry/ugly fish - they reduce energy
  • Avoid jellyfish - they blind you for a short period
  • Avoid obstacles such as boats, hooks and rocks

Controls

Hold mouse button down to swim upwards, when you let go he will sink down.
